name: neutron
description: This project can be use as a starting point for developing your Cosmos (Neutron) based SubQuery project

scripts.start:docker: docker compose pull && docker compose up --remove-orphans
scripts.dev: subql codegen && subql build && docker compose pull && docker compose up --remove-orphans
scripts.start:prod: docker compose pull && docker compose up -d --remove-orphans
scripts.rebuild:prod: yarn stop:prod && && yarn codegen && yarn build && yarn start:prod

author: SubQuery Team
